channel.title: UnderCurrent
channel.description: UnderCurrent dives into today’s most buzz-worthy topics, blending humor and insight to offer fresh perspectives. Each episode tackles current events in a way that keeps you entertained and intrigued. Join us for conversations that keep you in the know and laughing along the way!
channel.itunes:author: GoGecko Studios

item.title: Ep. 1 - P. Diddy Controversy
item.description: In this episode of UnderCurrent, we take a look at the latest P. Diddy controversy, unpacking the story with our unique blend of humor and depth. Tune in to see what’s really happening behind the headlines.

item.title: Ep. 2 - Trapped in Greece
item.description: In this episode of UnderCurrent, we explore what it’s like to get stuck in Greece due to bureaucracy, along with a complex guide to Greek culture and its unique cultural quirks.

item.title: Ep. 3 - Squirrel Killers!
item.description: In this episode of UnderCurrent, we dive into the controversial case surrounding Peanut the Squirrel, exploring the cultural impact and consequences of the state's decision.

item.title: Ep. 4 - Get Rich on Snapchat - Over 20,000 USD a Month
item.description: In this episode of UnderCurrent, we explore the fascinating story of a young Norwegian influencer making over 20,000 euros a month by posting 100 snaps a day. Is this lifestyle healthy? What are the challenges? Join us as we dive into the wild world of Snapchat influencers, examining the ups and downs and how to make a fortune sharing your "snap story."

item.title: Ep. 5 - The UFO Phenomenon: What the Pentagon Isn’t Telling Us
item.description: In this episode of UnderCurrent, we uncover the mysteries surrounding UFO sightings and recent revelations from the Pentagon. What are they hiding, and what could it mean for the future of humanity? Join us as we explore the fascinating and often controversial world of unidentified flying objects.
